directions.step:
Sift flour, measure, and sift. Cut in shortening with 2 spatulas. Add milk. Turn onto lightly floured board. Knead lightly and pat into sheet 1/2 inch thick. Cut with floured cutter. Bake in hot oven (450Ã¸ F) 12 minutes. 16 servings. The Household Searchlight - 1941
